Detailed Description

Implementation as a SPARK model of the native EnergyPlus model named BOILER:SIMPLE implemented in the file PlantBoilers.f90.

This model is used :

  • to validate the SPARK/EnergyPlus link and
  • assess the overhead due to calling a SPARK model through the SPARK/EnergyPlus driver as opposed to calling the native SUBROUTINE.
